## LightEventPayloads."LIGHT.SET\_TRACKED\_POSITION" property

Emitted when the tracked position of the spotlight is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[LightEvent.SET_TRACKED_POSITION]: {
        light: Light;
        position: Vector3Like;
    };
```
